summary: A collection of dataclasses that model the core AWS App Mesh resources—meshes, routes, virtual nodes, and virtual routers—along with shared utility classes. Each class captures configuration, status, and metadata, and offers methods to serialize the objects into plain dictionaries for use in the Moto mock service.
business_intent: Enable developers to simulate and test AWS App Mesh APIs by providing in‑memory representations of mesh components that behave like real AWS resources within the Moto testing framework.
